title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid email, password, and required fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the Register page
Input valid email, secure password and confirm password
Submit the registration form
Verify registration success message and email verification prompt
Check user is not automatically logged in before email verification

title: User Registration with Invalid Email
description: Verify registration rejection with invalid email formats.

steps.description: Navigate to the Register page
Input invalid email formats (e.g. missing '@', missing domain)
Input valid password and confirm password
Submit the registration form
Verify validation error messages related to email format

title: User Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify a registered user can log in successfully using correct credentials and receive valid JWT token with session persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Input registered email and correct password
Submit login form
Verify successful login and redirection to Dashboard
Verify JWT token is stored in localStorage with appropriate expiry

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to Login page
Input registered email with wrong password
Submit login form
Verify login failure error message is displayed
Verify no JWT token is stored in localStorage

title: Protected Routes Access for Authenticated User
description: Verify authenticated users can access protected routes like Dashboard and My Books pages.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user
Navigate to /dashboard route
Verify access to Dashboard page without redirection
Navigate to /mybooks route
Verify access to My Books page without redirection

title: Protected Routes Access for Unauthenticated User
description: Verify unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes and are redirected to Login page.

steps.description: Ensure user is logged out
Attempt to navigate directly to /dashboard
Verify redirection to Login page
Attempt to navigate directly to /mybooks
Verify redirection to Login page

title: Book Catalog Search by Title
description: Verify the book catalog search filters results correctly by book title.

steps.description: Navigate to Books catalog page
Input partial or full valid book title in search bar
Perform search
Verify search results contain only books matching the title query

title: Book Catalog Filter by Category
description: Verify filtering by book category returns correct subset of books.

steps.description: Navigate to Books catalog page
Select a category filter from available options
Verify only books belonging to selected category are displayed

title: Book Catalog Pagination Navigation
description: Verify pagination controls navigate correctly through book result pages.

steps.description: Navigate to Books catalog page with many books
Click on next page pagination button
Verify new page of books is displayed
Click on previous page pagination button
Verify previous page of books is displayed

title: View Detailed Book Information
description: Verify users can view complete details of a selected book including image, description, ratings, and add to cart option.

steps.description: Navigate to Books catalog
Select a book from the list to view details
Verify detailed page shows book image, full description, author, category, ratings
Verify 'Add to Cart' button is present and enabled

title: Add a Book to Shopping Cart
description: Verify that users can add a book to the shopping cart from the detail page.

steps.description: Navigate to a book's detailed page
Click on 'Add to Cart' button
Verify book is added to cart and cart badge count increments

title: Update Cart Item Quantity
description: Verify users can update quantity of books in the shopping cart and totals update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Cart page with at least one book in the cart
Change the quantity of a book to a valid number
Verify the cart item quantity changes and order totals reflect the update

title: Remove Book from Shopping Cart
description: Verify that users can remove a book from their shopping cart and the cart updates correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Cart page with at least one book added
Click the remove/delete button for a book
Verify the book is removed from the cart and totals update accordingly

title: Checkout Order Summary Accuracy
description: Verify the order summary displays correct pricing and items before finalizing purchase.

steps.description: Navigate to Cart page with multiple books
Verify order summary displays correct book titles, quantities, prices and total amount

title: Add New Book as Seller with Valid Data
description: Verify sellers can add new book listings with valid inputs including image upload and category selection.

steps.description: Log in as seller
Navigate to Add/Edit Book page
Fill in book details with valid inputs, select category and upload valid image
Submit form to add book
Verify new book appears in seller's My Books list

title: Edit Existing Book as Seller with Validation
description: Verify sellers can edit their book listing and validation prevents invalid inputs.

steps.description: Log in as seller
Navigate to My Books page and choose a book to edit
Modify details with invalid input (e.g. blank required fields, invalid image format)
Attempt to save changes
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown and changes are not saved

title: Delete Book Listing as Seller
description: Verify sellers can delete their book listings and confirmation prompts are displayed.

steps.description: Log in as seller
Navigate to My Books page
Initiate delete action for a specific book
Verify a confirmation prompt appears
Confirm deletion
Verify book no longer appears in the seller's listing

title: Newsletter Subscription Success
description: Verify newsletter subscription form submits successfully and EmailJS integration sends emails.

steps.description: Navigate to Newsletter Subscription form
Input valid email address
Submit the subscription form
Verify success notification is displayed
Verify EmailJS service call is successfully made

title: Newsletter Subscription Failure with Invalid Email
description: Verify newsletter subscription form validation prevents invalid email submission.

steps.description: Navigate to Newsletter Subscription form
Input invalid email formats
Attempt to submit the form
Verify validation error messages are displayed and submission is blocked

title: Navigation Header Responsive Behavior
description: Verify navigation header renders correctly and remains functional across different screen sizes and devices.

steps.description: Load the site on desktop screen size
Verify navigation menu, cart badge, search bar, and auth status display correctly
Resize viewport to tablet size
Verify navigation adapts (e.g. hamburger menu) and remains functional
Resize viewport to mobile size
Verify mobile friendly navigation UI and all controls work as expected

title: Footer Content and Links Verification
description: Verify footer component correctly displays all site links, social media icons, and contact info.

steps.description: Navigate to any page with the footer component
Verify footer content is visible and correctly formatted
Verify all site links and social media icons are present and clickable

title: Loading Spinner Visibility During Async Operations
description: Verify that the animated loading spinner displays during all async network requests and page transitions.

steps.description: Trigger actions that cause network requests (e.g. login, book search, add to cart)
Verify loading spinner component is visible while waiting for responses
Verify spinner is hidden once the async operation completes

title: Google Books API Integration and Data Display
description: Verify external book data from Google Books API is fetched and displayed correctly when requested.

steps.description: Trigger search or book enrichment that invokes Google Books API
Verify data returned matches search query and is rendered properly in the UI
Verify error handling on Google Books API failures

title: Session Persistence with JWT and Local Storage
description: Verify that user session persists across browser refreshes using JWT stored in localStorage.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Verify JWT token stored in localStorage
Refresh the browser window
Verify user remains logged in and protected routes remain accessible
Clear localStorage and refresh
Verify user is logged out and redirected to Login for protected routes

title: Error Handling for Network Failures
description: Verify that network errors during operations like login, book fetch, checkout display user-friendly error messages without breaking UI.

steps.description: Simulate network failure for key API calls (e.g. login, book data fetch, add to cart)
Verify appropriate error message is shown to user
Verify UI remains functional and user can retry the operation
